text:
The line 'protected DecimalFormat decimalFormat = decimalFormats[3];' should be
moved after the initialization of 'decimalFormats'.  Currently it ends up with a
null value, which can lead to NullPointerExceptions.
creator: daniel.rice@sun.com
vincent.hardy@sun.com
text:
This bug was fixed right after release 1.5. You should get the latest CVS
version where this problem is fixed.
